text: Aur jab inko hamari saaf saaf aayat sunayi jati hain to tum dekhte ho ke munkireen e haqq ke chehre bigadne lagte hain aur aisa mehsoos hota hai ke abhi woh un logon par toot padenge jo unhein hamari aayat sunate hain. Inse kaho “ main bataoon tumhein ke issey badhtar cheez kya hai? Aag, Allah ne usi ka wada un logon ke haqq mein kar rakkha hai jo qabool e haqq se inkar karein, aur woh bahut hi bura thikana hai”
